Sara is a 36-year-old woman married to Henry who adds additional income to support their family welfare. They have been blessed with three children.  Sarah has been a poultry farmer for a period of four years earning her an income of KES 12,000 at the end of every month.

Sarah was introduced to VisionFund Kenya by a Credit Officer and is now taking her first loan of KES 30,000 and intends to use the entire amount to buy some additional hens and chicks to sell to her customers on a daily basis.

Sarah plans to use the anticipated income to pay school fees for her children and hopes to become a successful businesswoman with a bright future.

loans.use: To buy more hens and chicks to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Hace 17 años atrás Reyna, madre de dos hijos ya independiente ella comenzó su propio negocio cuando tenía la edad de 18 años, motivado a sobresalir por sí misma y le necesidad de tener su propio dinero y no depender de un jefe o de otra persona tomo la iniciativa de comercializar ropa de casa en casa y con el pasar de los años estableció sólidamente este negocio. En la actualidad Reyna solicita de un préstamo para comprar pantalones, camisas, blusas y falta. Estimando que el préstamo a solicitud le será de mucha ayuda porque lograra que su negocio crezca y expandir más sus rutas de comercialización. Como planes a futuro Reyna desea mejorar su casa de habitación.
texts.en: 17 years ago, Reyna, mother of two children who are now independent, started her own business when she was 18 years old. Motivated to excel on her own and by the need to have her own money and not depend on a boss or another person, she took the initiative to sell clothing house to house, and with the passing of the years, she firmly established this business. Reyna currently requests a loan to buy pants, shirts, blouses, and skirts, appreciating that the requested loan will be very helpful because she will achieve making her business grow and further expand her selling routes. As for future plans, Reyna wishes to improve her house.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, blouses, and skirts.

loans.name: Nona

texts.en:
Nona is a 32-year-old divorced woman from the village of Manglisi. She has two school-aged daughters and the family earns a living only through Nona's private activities. Particularly, she takes care of a child and generates 200 GEL monthly. It's clear that this income is insignificant for covering even basic needs, so they are under the poverty line and require another source of income. 

Nona requested a loan from local financial institutions, but was rejected several times for her unstable financial condition. At last, her request was approved with the joint initiative between Kiva and Credo that gives a chance to poor people to start or re-start businesses. Nona plans to start a trading business parallel to her activity and somehow increase the living conditions of her family. 

With the requested money Nona will purchase stock of perfumes at wholesale prices and will sell them among her friends and villagers at increased prices.
 
The new business will greatly help Nona to satisfy her daughters' increased needs and improve their living conditions. She awaits your support and kindness.

loans.use: To purchase perfumes to start a trading business and generate additional income

loans.name: Soberana Group

texts.es:
Las soberanas es un grupo solidario integrado por tres mujeres laboriosas, coordinado por la señora María Antonia, quien tiene la edad de 38 años, soltera y madre de cinco hijos, dependiendo económicamente tres de ellos, su negocio es una fritanga, donde ofrece el servicio de comida por las noches y cuenta con la ayuda de su madre e hija mayor para la realización de las comidas, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de arroz, aceite, plátano verde, plátano maduro, huevos, salsa de tomate, crema, repollo, lechuga, tomate, queso, vinagre, carne de res, carne de cerdo, carne de pollo, etc., es el décimo cuarto ciclo que la institución le brinda financiamiento para su negocio y los logros han sido muchos, el principal es el aumento de la clientela lo que le ha permitido mejorar sus ingresos logrando de esta manera la construcción de su vivienda, esto la ha motivado a seguir solicitando créditos en la institución.
Las otras socias son las señoras, Audelina de 37 años de edad, quien se dedica a la comercialización de calzado desde hace seis años, y Josefa, quien tiene la edad de 37 años y ofrece el servicio de comida y refrescos naturales en su domicilio desde hace diez años.
texts.en: Las soberanas is a solidarity group formed by three hardworking women, coordinated by la señora María Antonia, who is 38 years old, single, and mother of five children, three of which depend on her economically. Her business is fried food, in which she offers food service in the evening, and she relies on the help of her mother and eldest daughter to make the food. She requests the loan to buy rice, oil, green plantain, ripe plantain, eggs, tomato sauce, cream, cabbage, lettuce, tomato, cheese, vinegar, beef, pork, chicken, etc. This is the 14th cycle the institution has granted her funding for her business and the achievements have been many, the main one being the increase in customers, which has allowed her to improve her income, achieving in this way the construction of her home. This has motivated her to continue requesting loans from the institution. The other members are the señoras Audelina, of 37 years of age who has worked selling shoes for the last six years, and Josefa, who is 37 years old and has offered food and natural beverage service in her home for the last ten years.

loans.use: to buy basic staple foods.

loans.name: Flor Teresa

texts.es:
Flor es una mujer pujante, servicial y trabajadora, a sus 50 años de edad, es casada y madre de dos hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación.

Desde hace 20 años se desempeña en el campo de la confección, prestando el servicio de confección a terceros y a clientes directos con una pequeña línea propia, el oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica y trabaja sola todos los días, así genera los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.

Actualmente se motiva a solicitar el crédito para comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, resorte, entre otros) esto le permitirá tener material disponible para cumplir con la entrega oportuna de los pedidos que tiene pendientes, logrando fidelizar sus clientes actuales.

Flor manifiesta que desea continuar realizando su labor con mucho empeño, pues quiere ampliar su negocio y poder generar oportunidades de empleo, además de garantizar una estabilidad económica para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Flor is a strong, attentive, and hard-working woman. She is 50 years old, married, and the mother of two children, whom she has moved forward with great effort and dedication. 

For the past 20 years, she has made a living in the tailoring business, providing dressmaking services to third parties and to direct customers with her own small line. She learned this craft empirically and works alone every day. In this way, she makes enough income to support her husband with the household expenses.

Currently, she is requesting a loan to buy supplies at wholesale (fabrics, threads, and elastics, among others), which will allow her to have materials available to meet the delivery of orders that are pending in a timely manner in order to keep her existing customers.

Flor states that she desires to continue performing her work with great perseverance, for she wishes to expand her business and to create employment opportunities, in addition to guaranteeing economic stability in order to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies at wholesale (fabrics, threads, and elastics, among others), which will allow her to have materials available to meet the delivery of orders in a timely manner.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the repair of the fishing boat and to buy new fishing nets.

loans.name: Chyrinet

texts.en:
Chyrinet is 31 years old, married, with a 12-year-old daughter. She live in Palompon, Leyte with her family. Her husband is a carpenter while Chyrinet operates a Sari-sari (variety) store business. Her store has been in existence for 10 years now. She is asking for a loan to buy more stock of merchandise such as biscuits, liquor, soft drinks and canned goods. She hope that with a loan, she can further expand her business and increase her daily sales. 

In the future, she hopes to make her store bigger and more successful.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, liquor, candies, soft drinks and canned goods.

loans.name: Jhon Alejandro

texts.es:
Jhon, de 34 años, ha optado por montar un negocio de comidas cerca a su casa ubicada en el municipio de Sabaneta, en este negocio vende pasteles de pollo, empanadas, buñuelos, entre otros y recibe la ayuda de su esposa quien es su más grande apoyo.

Trabaja todos los días desde las 7 de la mañana hasta la 1 de la tarde, es un hombre muy responsable, juicioso y aplicad con su negocio ya que lo inicio hace apenas 1 mes.

Entre sus sueños más latentes esta el poder tener un restaurante en el que ofrezcan distintos tipos de alimentos y puede ofrecer empleos.

El pide un aliento económico para capitalizar su negocio y comprar insumos como pollo, aceite, harina, entre otros y algunos activos como una parrilla.

El crédito impactara su vida y su negocio de un modo muy favorable pues podrá cumplir con su sueño y tendrá una mayor variedad de alimentos para ofrecer a sus clientes, además de que de este negocio dependen sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jhon, 34 years old, has opted to set up a food business near his home located in the municipality of Sabaneta. In this business he sells chicken pies, empanadas, fritters, among other things, and he receives help from his wife who is his greatest support.

He works every day from seven in the morning until one in the afternoon. He is a very responsible man, wise and diligent with his business, and he started it just one month ago.

Among his most latent dreams is the ability to have a restaurant in which they offer distinct types of food and that can offer jobs.

He asks for economic support to capitalize on his business and to buy supplies like chicken, oil, flour, among other things and some assets like a grill.

The loan will impact his life and his business in a very favorable way, since he will be able to achieve his dream and have a better variety of foods to offer his customers, and also his children depend on this business.

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients to strengthen and capitalize on his business.

loans.name: Magdalina

texts.en: Magdalina is a businesswoman from Barangay 2, Tangub City. She is 47 years old, married and has expertise in selling. She runs a little store in the market and earns a meager income that sufficiently supports her family. Magdalina is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. Now, she applied for a loan to purchase merchandise for her store. Magdalina continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her store to increase sales.

loans.name: Agustin Leonardo

texts.es: Agustín de 28 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos de 8 y 2 años de edad. Él es un hombre que todos los días se esfuerza por sacar adelante a su familia y es por ellos y su bienestar que se desempeña como albañil independiente desde hace 7 años, construyendo y realizando mejoras a viviendas en todo el municipio, por lo que es bastante reconocido y cuenta con una extensa cartera de clientes. Agustín se esfuerza por brindar lo mejor a su hogar y es por ello que solicita un crédito para construir una champa para la cocina ya que esta se encuentra a la intemperie por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para construir una champa para la cocina.
texts.en:
Agustin, 28 years old, lives in his own home with his life partner and their 2 children of 8 and 2 years old. He is a man who strives everyday to get his family ahead and it is for them and their well being that he has worked as an independent bricklayer for the last 7 years. He has been building and making home improvements throughout the city for which he is well known and has an extensive portfolio of customers.

Agustin strives to contribute the best to his homestead and that is why he is requesting a loan to build a hut for the kitchen. This one is outdoors so he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in: galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails to build a hut for the kitchen.

loans.use: to invest in: galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails to build a hut for the kitchen.

loans.name: Los Gemelos Group

texts.es:
Los Gemelos es un grupo solidario integrado por cuatro socios laboriosos, quien lo coordina es la señora Vilma tiene edad de 58 años, soltera, se dedica a la hecha y venta de tortillas en su domicilio, este negocio lo impulso hace treinta y seis años, y el crédito lo solicita para la compra de quintal de maíz, flete de leña y bolsa. 
El resto de los integrantes son el señor Bismarck, quien tiene la edad de 32 años y se dedica a la comercialización de gaseosas en la parada de buses, y los jóvenes, Magali, quien tiene la edad de 19 años, y comercializa verduras en el mercado más populoso de la capital, e Iván de 20 años de edad, dedicado a la comercialización de legumbres en el mercado más populoso de la capital desde hace dos años.
texts.en:
Los Gemelos is a solidarity group formed by four hardworking members. La señora Vilma is the one who coordinates it. She is 58 years old, single, and works in the making and selling of tortillas in her home. She launched this business 36 years ago, and she requests the loan to buy a quintal of corn, a load of firewood, and bags. 

The rest of the members are el señor Bismarck, who is 32 years old and works in the sale of soft drinks at the bus stop, and the young people, Magali, who is 19 years old and sells vegetables in the most populous market in the capital, and Iván, 20 years old, who has sold legumes in the most populous market of the capital for the last two years.

loans.use: to buy a quintal of corn, a load of firewood, and bags.

loans.name: Martina

texts.es: Martina de 49 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijas de 22 y 15 años de edad. Ella es una mujer que gracias a su esfuerzo y tenacidad ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijas acompañada de su esposo que siempre le ha brindado su apoyo tanto emocional como económico gracias a que presta sus servicios de seguridad en una playa cercana, ella se gana la vida con su tienda de productos de primera necesidad la cual ha instalado en su domicilio desde hace 7 años y gracias a la cual han logrado salir adelante junto a su familia. Martina desea mejorar las condiciones de vida  de su hogar cambiando el techo de su vivienda que se encuentra deteriorado, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos para cambiar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Martina, 49 years old, lives in her own home with her husband and their 2 daughters of 22 and 15 years of age. She is a woman who thanks to her effort and tenacity has managed to support her daughters together with her husband. He has always provided her emotional as well as economic support since he provides security services at a nearby beach. She makes a living from her store of basic necessities that she set up in her home 7 years ago. Thanks to this they have managed to succeed along with their family.

Martina wishes to improve her household’s standard of living and change the roof which is deteriorated. This is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in: galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails to change the roof of her home.

loans.use: to invest in: galvanized sheet metal, wood and nails to change the roof of her home.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
La pasión por las computadoras es lo que llevo a Maria Cristina a estudiar Ingeniería en sistema los domingos cursa el quinto año de la carrera. Tiene 23 años y está soltera madre de un pequeño bebe de tres años.
Escogió la carrera porque le gusta mucho y le ayuda en su trabajo actual porque práctica lo aprendido. Sus padres le ayudan en los gastos de sus estudios. Solicita el crédito para pagar sus módulos y obtener su título. Dentro de sus metas próximas está desempeñarse mejor en su empleo y poner en práctica los conocimientos adquiridos. Su plan futuro es poner su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Passion for computers is what led Maria Cristina to study Systems Engineering on Sundays in the fifth year of her degree.She is 23 years old and the single mother of a young three year old baby.

She chose her major because she likes it and it helps her in her present job. You learn by practicing. Her parents help her with the cost of her studies. She is requesting the loan to pay for her courses and obtain her degree. Amongst her next goals are to carry out her work better and put her acquired knowledge into practice. Her future plan is to open her own business.

loans.use: to pay for her studies and obtain her degree.

loans.name: Chantal

texts.en: Chantal is 29 years old. She is married with 2 children aged between 4 and 1 year, not yet in school. She sells clothes and has been selling for 3 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more clothes for sale. The profits from the business will be used to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Samuel Armando

texts.es: Samuel de 30 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos de 1 y 5 años de edad. Él es un hombre trabajador que se esfuerza por darle lo mejor a su familia apoyado en su trabajo de motorista de un moto taxi en el cual todos los días se levanta muy temprano para transportar a sus clientes a diferentes lugares del municipio. Samuel ha construido una galera en su vivienda la cual protege: la pila, el lavadero y la cocina de la lluvia y el sol, pero el piso de esta es de tierra por lo que él desea encementarlo, el sabe que no tiene fluidez económica para ello pero si puede cancelar las cuotas de un crédito por lo que se acerco a FUSAI para solicitarlo, dicho crédito piensa invertirlo en: cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso de la galera.
texts.en: Samuel, 30, lives in his own home with his life partner and their 2 children, ages 1 and 5. He is a hard worker who strives to give the best to his family. He supports himself with his job as a mototaxi driver. Every day he wakes up very early to transport his customers to different places in town. Samuel has built a covered terrace in his home which protects the sink, the laundry room, and the kitchen from the rain and sun, but it has a dirt floor so he wants to lay down a cement floor. He knows that he doesn't have economic liquidity for that, but he can pay off the installment payments and so that's why he went to Fusai to request a loan. He wants to use this loan to buy cement, sand, and gravel to lay down a concrete floor in the covered terrace.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel to lay down a cement floor in the covered terrace.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
Juan es un campesino, humilde y trabajador con el empuje y verraquera que distingue a los hombres y mujeres del campo.

Es un Hombre de mente emprendedora y desde muy pequeño aprendió todos los oficios del campo como cultivos y crianza de animales, tanto así que hoy en día tiene su propio cultivo de Tomate; alimentos que vende en la plaza de mercado del municipio de El Carmen De Viboral, Antioquia.

Este personaje tiene como propósito aumentar sus cultivos y mejorar los que actualmente tiene y es por eso que acude a la ayuda de un crédito para la compra de semillas de tomate y materiales para construir un invernadero.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de progresar como empresario y como persona, además de aumentar sus ingresos y seguir aportando el sustento en su hogar.

Él lo único que quiere es poder mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is a farmer, humble and hardworking with the dedication and strength of character that distinguishes men and women from the countryside.

He is a man with an entrepreneurial mindset and from the time he was very young he learned all of the tasks of the country, such as farming and raising livestock.  Today he has his own tomato farm and sells tomatoes in the plaza of the municipal market of El Carmen De Viboral, Antioquia.

He would like to increase his crops and improve the ones he already has, so he is requesting a loan to buy tomato seeds and materials to build a greenhouse.

The money will give him the opportunity to grow as a business owner and as a person, and will increase his income so that he can continue providing for his family.

The only thing he wants is to be able to improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase tomato seeds and materials to build a greenhouse.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
Maria, a sus 47 años de edad, es una mujer carismática y servicial que se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes que inició por la necesidad de generar ingresos para sacar adelante a su familia. 

A pesar de las adversidades, ella tuvo la fortaleza y la determinación para levantarse y seguir adelante y, gracias a ello lleva 8 años de trayectoria en esta actividad.

Su propósito en la vida es seguir progresando y por ello desea fortalecer su negocio acreditándolo con la compra de surtido de productos como abarrotes, granos, frituras, bebidas gaseosas y en general productos básicos de la canasta familiar, de esta forma podrá ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor calidad y servicio, logrando aumentar notablemente sus ventas y los ingresos que recibe de ellas.

Maria manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo con su negocio y, en un futuro desea convertirlo en un supermercado, en el que los clientes puedan encontrar todos los artículos que necesiten y así mejorar la rentabilidad y poder ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.

Apoyando a este crédito estarás contribuyendo con el emprendimiento de las mujeres Colombianas!
texts.en:
Maria is a charismatic and helpful woman who works in her own business, a grocery store. She started it because of the necessity of generating income to get ahead with her family. In spite of adversity she had the strength and determination to pick herself up and continue to move forward. Thanks to this she has been in this business for 8 years.

Her goal in life is to continue to progress and to do this she wants to strengthen her business`s worth with the purchase of an assortment of products like groceries, grains, soft drinks and basic need items. Doing this she can offer her clients better quality and service, manage to increase her sales and the profits that she gains from them.

Maria declares that her biggest wish is to continue to expand her business. In the future she wants to convert it into a supermarket where her clients can find anything they need. She would have higher profits and could provide her family with a better quality of living. Supporting this loan contributes to the entrepreneurship of Colombian women.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of groceries for her store.

loans.name: Carlos Enrique

texts.es:
Carlos un hombre de 33 años de edad que se dedica ya desde hace mucho tiempo a la venta de alimentos y bebidas ambulantemente en un negocio que el mismo creo y lo ubica cerca a su casa, es padre de 3 hijos de 2, 3 y 9 años de edad, vive con su pareja y depende únicamente de este negocio para poder sobrevivir. 
Carlos consciente de los próximos eventos que se avecinan como lo son día de amor y amistad y Halloween y para los niños y adultos que pasen por su negocio tendrá ricas preparaciones listas para el consumo. 
Solicita un crédito para tener capital de trabajo y cubrir estos eventos que representaran una buena entrada de alimento. 
Carlos se compromete con los prestamistas que apoyen su proyecto a pagar cumplidamente las cuotas ya que gracias a estos puede mejorar la calidad de vida de hogar y solo aspira a mejorar tener más cosas, una casa, un negocio consolidado pero ira a pasos lentos pero firmes.
texts.en:
Carlos is 33 yeas old and for many years he has had a business selling food and drinks in the street.  He created the business and located it near his home. He is father to 3 children ages 2, 3, and 9.  He lives with his wife and they depend on this business alone in order to survive.

Carlos is aware of upcoming events such as the Day of Love and Friendship and Halloween, and wants the children and adults who come by his business to have delicious items ready to eat.  He is requesting a loan for working capital to cover these events as they are a good opportunity to sell food.

Carlos promises the lenders who support his project that he will make his payments as agreed.  Thanks to them he can improve the quality of life in his home.  He hopes to improve and have more things, such as a home and a successful business. He will take small, but firm steps towards this goal.

loans.use: working capital to cover events such as the Day of Love & Friendship, Halloween, and  his sales on the weekend.

loans.name: Tungreishang

texts.en:
Bold and courageous, 18-year-old Tungreishang is pictured with her mother. She was born and brought up among five siblings in a happy family. She says, “Our family is a poor family.” They are financially poor but rich at heart because they love each other and cherish each other’s company. She had experienced many inadequate financial situations since her childhood and that does help her in building her aspiration to be successful one day in the near future and help her family to elevate their financial condition. 

It was her childhood dream to become an air hostess and she is very fortunate to make that dream come true at a very young age. Her family members were very happy about the news. Her mother, who is very supportive of her, said, “the heavens heard our prayers.”  After the selection, she and her family were in search of money to borrow  from friends and relatives to pay for the security deposit.  However they did not find anyone who could lend such a large sum of money at one time. Fortunately they came across one relative who is a member of WSDS who suggested that they could take an education loan from Kiva. All the family members were relieved and delighted to hear such good news. “My burden has gone,” said her mother. For a family like us, it is much easier and convenient to take this loan because the repayment cycle is easy with a small amount at a time. Tungreishang wishes to earn and help her family financially and wants to have a financial role in supporting her siblings’ education. She is thoughtful and has a very big heart. She says, “thank you so much WSDS and Kiva for supporting me. I will always remember the benevolent act you showed and have given me.”

loans.use: To pay the security deposit fee to join the cabin crew training.

loans.name: Sopheap

texts.en: Sopheap is 42 years old, a widowed garment-factory worker with four children living in Kampong Speu province, Cambodia. As a worker since 2011, she can earn approximately $5 per day. One of her children is an excavator driver earning $7 daily and two others attend school. To earn more income for the family, Sopheap would like to request a loan to expand her house roof forward (to provide a canopy) for her daughter selling groceries underneath. This loan will help to improve her family’s finance. In the future, she is going to build fences around her home and help her two children to finish high school.

loans.use: to expand her house roof forward (to provide a canopy) for her daughter selling groceries underneath

loans.name: Solitei

texts.en:
Solitei is 32 years old, married, and he and his spouse have been blessed with 4 children. He sells livestock and has been in this business for the past 4 years. 

He plans to use this loan to buy more goats and sheep to sell. He will use the anticipated profits to buy more stock of livestock.

This is his third loan term from VisionFund Kenya and he repaid his previous loans successfully. His future hopes are to grow his business, make more income and have a happy family.

loans.use: To buy goats and sheep to sell.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel vive junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos, es una mujer muy trabajadora que siempre le ha gustado el negocio, administra una pequeña tienda ubicada en su casa de habitación en donde vende producto de la canasta básica a sus vecinos. 

Ella estudio hasta noveno grado y por la situación económica no siguió preparándose académicamente. Su tienda es bastante visitada por los pobladores de dicha comunidad debido a que da precios accesibles para sus clientes así como facilidades de pago, brindando la oportunidad de darles créditos y que le paguen cada quincena de mes. 

El crédito que está tramitando es para comprar pan, golosinas, bebidas, lácteos, embutidos, arroz, frijoles, etc. más productos y aumentar la gama de productos que ofrece a sus clientes, la idea que tiene es estar preparada con suficiente mercadería para abastecer a su vecindario.
texts.en:
Isabel lives with her husband and two children. She is a hardworking woman who has always liked business. She runs a small store located in her home where she sells basic food products to her neighbors.

Isabel studied until the 9th grade but because of her financial situation, she couldn't continue studying. Her store is visited quite a bit by the residents of her community because she gives her customers affordable prices and things such as easy payment options, providing them with loans, or letting them pay every 2 weeks.

This loan will be used to buy bread, snacks, drinks, dairy products, cold cuts, rice, beans, etc., in order to have more products and to increase the range of products Isabel offers to her customers. The idea is to be prepared with enough products to supply her neighborhood.

loans.use: to buy bread, snacks, drinks, dairy products, cold cuts, rice, beans, etc., in order to have more products and to increase the range of products she offers to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase items wholesale (snacks, soft drinks, sweets, baked goods, etc.) to continue her business.

loans.name: Siyeng

texts.en:
Siyeng is 33 years old, a married garment-factory worker with two children living in Kampong Speu province of Cambodia. 

She has been a worker since 2011. One of the children attends school. Her husband is 32, a farmer since 1998. Both of them can earn approximately $7 per day. 

Now Siyeng would like to request a loan to buy lumber to build a house. This loan will help her and her family have a proper house. In the future, she is going to buy more farmland for rice cultivation, build a bathroom with a toilet, and support her children to finish high school. She also wants her children to attend English courses.

loans.use: to buy lumber to build a house

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline is 49 years old. She is married with 6 children aged between 17 and 6 years, all of whom go to school. 

She sells fruits and has been selling in a business for three years. With the loan, she would like to buy more sweet bananas and avocados for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more sweet bananas and avocados for sale.

loans.name: Teodorico

texts.en:
Teodorico is 64 years old. He is very responsible with his household obligations and has always been known to provide the best for his family. He currently lives with his wife and three children. He is a farmer who plants corn.

Teodorico readies for the next cropping season. He wants to prepare well, especially the much needed land and seedbed preparations. He wants to have enough supply of corn fertilizer, which is why he applied a loan from the Cooperative. Teodorico hopes to save enough for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy corn fertilizer for growing more produce.

loans.name: Mila

texts.en:
Mila is a resident of Palompon, Leyte. She is married with four children ages 14-31. For the last three years, she has been engaged in raising hogs for a living. This is her way of helping her husband who also works as a driver to their tricycle. 

She is asking for a loan to be able to sustain her business. She will use it to buy starter feed, grower feed for her hogs, and more piglets to raise.

Mila is optimistic about the impact that a loan can have on her livelihood. She hopes that someday she can make her business bigger and make her children's lives better than hers was.

loans.use: to buy starter feed,  grower feed, and piglets

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is now 50 years old and has two children. They are currently living in a rural community. 

As a way of generating income, she has engaged in selling native handicrafts and sewing native costumes to sell. She aims to buy  more handicrafts to resell but she has inadequate capital. 

For this reason, she would like to access financial assistance of PHP15,000 to buy threads, needles, fabrics, native attire, and other native handicrafts to resell. Being a hard-working mother, she believes that someday she will further improve the business.

loans.use: to buy threads, needles, fabrics, native attire, and other native handicrafts to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new fishing nets

loans.name: Cipriana

texts.en:
Cipriana is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her as she was able to purchase spare parts and supplies needed in her appliance repair shop. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household, and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan for her to pay for spare parts, supplies, and maintenance for her shop. Her profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Cipriana hopes to have more clients and she only wants good health for her family. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for spare parts of appliances and materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is 27 years old. She is married with one child who is seven months old.  

She sells clothes and has been running a business for the past two years. With the loan requested, she would like to buy more skirts, shorts, and shirts for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: To buy more skirts, shorts, and shirts for sale.

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en:
Jonalyn is a 32-year-old resident of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. She is married to Camilo, a tricycle driver and has two kids. The eldest is still in the Preparatory Level and the youngest is not of school age yet. She manages her household while operating a business. She works hard to augment their income to support and meet their daily personal, household needs. 

Jonalyn has operated a general store for the past seven years. (In the Philippines, a general store is basically a small convenience store which sells fresh, dry, and packaged commodities directly to consumers. Almost all products are essential household items and food. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a 5 PHP-worth of cooking oil, or an egg.) She earns a profit by buying supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Aside from this she also has a tricycle unit for a transport service, which her husband operates to earn additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum net income of 3,000 PHP per day. 

To help her to continue to operate her general store business she is requesting a 35,000 PHP loan, which she will use to buy grocery items such as fresh meat, sacks of rice, charcoal , soda and other grocery stuff. She is positive that it will boost her income as she expands her business. Her earnings helps her to meet her family's daily expenses and to send her children to school. She is thanking God and Kiva for the financial help that will be given her.

Jonalyn hopes to maintain and grow her business. She strives hard to give her children the best education possible and prays for a quiet and happy life. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To buy grocery items, beverages and toiletries for resale.

loans.name: Durga Mahila Samuha Group

texts.en:
Dulari, a small businesswoman aged 54, is the leader of a group that hails from Rohini village in the Deoghar district, Jharkhand. She is married and has five children, all of whom are married. 

Dulari (hand raised) and her husband are into a business making and selling bari (spicy dumplings). She has been doing this business for the last 22 years.  At present, her daily income is 300 to 400 Indian rupees. 

Along with her four other members, she formed a group “Durga Mahila Samuha” to acquire a loan to improve their business. 

Dulari wants to enlarge her business for which she is requesting a loan. She plans to purchase a huge amount of raw materials to prepare bari. 

The other three members of her group are Pinki, Buju, and Mina.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for preparing bari

loans.name: Judy

texts.en:
This is Judy. She previously accessed a 20,000 PHP loan that she used to buy spare parts and cover maintenance costs for her computer shop. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household, and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan to buy parts and cover maintenance costs for her computer shop. Her profits from her business will definitely help her to sustain their daily needs and the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Judy hopes to sustain their everyday needs through her business and that her children will be able to complete their studies. She meets every week with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay micro finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional computer parts and supplies needed in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement and sand to cement over the walls of his house

loans.name: Epiphanie

texts.en:
Epiphanie is aged 28.  She is married with two children aged between 6 and 5 years. 

She sells clothes and has been selling in a business for four years. After getting her loan, she would like to buy more shirts and shorts for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more shirts and shorts for sale.

loans.name: Jahongir

texts.en: Jahongir is 18 years old and lives with his mother and father. His father, Alisher, is a very kind and hardworking man. Jahogir’s father supported him to apply to the university. He is a student of the second course now. Jahongir studies politics and business at the Tajikistan State University. Jahongir is one of the best students. He dreams to be a good specialist after graduation. His father works in a collective farm and his mother works in IMON. Jahongir must pay for his tuition and that’s why he is asking for a loan. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to pay for tuition.

loans.name: El Paraiso Group

texts.es:
El Paraíso es un grupo solidario integrado por tres microempresarios laboriosos, coordinado por la señora Martha de 53 años, casada y madre de cuatro hijos, todos mayor de edad, ofrece productos escolares y productos varios como es leña, perfumes, piñatas pequeñas, etc., el crédito lo solicita para invertir en cartulina, papel crepe, silicón, papel de regalo, block, cuadernos, cajas de lapiceros, perfumes, flete de leña, etc. Con el crédito anterior logro ofrecer a la población mayor variedad de productos. 
Le resto de los integrantes son los señores Orlando, de 56 años de edad, quien ofrece el servicio de comida (fritanga) en su domicilio desde hace diez años, y Virgilio quien tiene la edad de 62 años, propietario de una pulpería en su domicilio desde hace veintisiete años.
texts.en:
El Paraíso is a solidarity group comprised of three hard-working micro-entrepreneurs. It is coordinated by Martha who is 53 years old, married, and the mother of four adult children.

She offers school supplies and a variety of products such as wood, perfumes, small piñatas, etc. She is requesting the loan to buy cardboard, crepe paper, silicone, gift wrapping paper, writing pads, notebooks, boxes of pens, perfumes, loads of firewood, etc. With the previous loan, she was able to offer a greater variety of products to the community.

The rest of the group includes Orlando, 56 years old, who has been offering home-style food for sale (fritanga) from his home for ten years now, and Virgilio who is 62 and the owner of a pulpería at his home for the last twenty seven years.

loans.use: to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Loida

texts.en:
Loida spends her time cooking snack foods to sell. She usually cooks native cakes and vends them around their village. 

She has been managing the business for ten years now. Loida shares that, through the income she earns from her business, she is able to provide her children with allowances while going to school. 

Loida’s greatest dream is for her children to finish their studies and hold a degree. As she believes that having a higher education will lead to efficiency in finding a white-collar job. 

With regards to her business, Loida is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy glutinous rice, sugar, margarine, and milk to use in cooking snacks. Loida is doing her best to make her snack foods more delicious to encourage more costumers and income as well.

loans.use: to buy glutinous rice, sugar, margarine, and milk to use in cooking snacks.

loans.name: Bernadine

texts.en:
Bernadine is thankful for the loan assistance granted to her because she was able to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household, and business expenditures.

She would like to apply for another 60,000 PHP loan for her to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Bernadine still wants to open branches of her store someday. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages to sell

loans.name: Farrukh

texts.ru:
Этого молодого человека зовут Фаррух. Он начинающий бизнесмен. Фаррух сейчас готовится к открытию своего дела. Фаррух имеет опыт в сфере продаж. Он работал наемным продавцом и приобрел полезный опыт для начинания своего торгового бизнеса. Фарруха интересует купля-продажа детской одежды. Он уже приобрел торговую точку на местном рынке. Фаррух будет привозить товар с оптового рынка города Душанбе и продавать в своей точке по розничной цене. Для того, чтобы закупить товар Фарруху не хватает немного суммы денег. Он недостаюшую сумму берет в кредит. Фаррух будет вести бизнес самостоятельно. Получаемый прибыль с бизнеса он будет использовать на семейные расходы и на оборот торговли. 
Фаррух уже женат. Ему 24 года. Он с женой, родителями, братом и сестрой живет в районе Дж.Руми. Его брат в настоящий момент является трудовым мигрантом России. 
Благодаря кредиту Фаррух сможет принести в семью еще один источник дохода и финансовое положение семьи намного улучшится.
texts.en: This young man's name is Farrukh. He is a beginning businessman. Farrukh is currently preparing to open his own business. He has experience in sales, having worked as a hired salesperson, where he gained useful experience in beginning his own retail business. Farrukh wants to buy and sell children's clothing. He has already obtained a space at a local market. Farrukh will bring goods from the wholesale market in Dushanbe and sell them at his location for retail prices. Farrukh doesn't have enough money to buy the goods, so he is taking out a loan for the needed sum. Farrukh is going to run the business himself. He will use the profit earned for family expenses and to circulate in the business. Farrukh is already married. He is 24 years old. He and his wife, parents, brother, and sister live in the J. Rumy district. His brother is currently a migrant worker in Russia. Thanks to the loan Farrukh will be able to provide another source of income and improve the family's financial standing.

loans.use: To purchase an assortment of children's clothing to begin sales

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in galvanized sheet metal and pins to replace his home's roof.

loans.name: Dilorom

texts.en:
Dilorom is a careful mother for her son. She lives with her son and husband together in the house which she has built with her dedication. 

She is 47 years old. She has begun a new business in the last four months. She buys fruits in bulk and sells them in a local market. Her husband helps her to develop new business. 

Dilorom plans to increase working capital and in this way to develop new business. With this aim, she took part in a course, "To Get Ahead," with a women's organization and got a certificate. Now she needs money. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 TJSi to buy fruits to increase her working capital. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy fruits for increasing the working capital of her new business

loans.name: Adoracion

texts.en:
Adoracion is an inspired mom of children who are attending school. According to Adoracion, her inspiration and drive to succeed are her children. Adoracion is doing her best to earn from her retail business so that she can provide for her children's needs in school. Her aspiration is to see them finish their studies and become professionals. For her, education is the best treasure she can pass to her children.

She plans to extend her products beyond groceries to increase her income. Adoracion wanted to borrow a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy drinks, coffee, milk, sugar, and more. She hopes that by managing her business well she will be able to provide for her children's needs in pursuing their education.

loans.use: to buy drinks, coffee, milk, and sugar.

loans.name: Jeanette

texts.en:
Jeannette is 42 years old and married with three children, between the ages of 14 and 17 years old. All of her children attend school.

Jeannette sells food stuff and has been working in a business for four years. With the loan, she would like to buy more potatoes, beans and bananas for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more potatoes, beans, and bananas for sale.

loans.name: Amparo

texts.en:
39-year-old Amparo hails from the town of Palompon in Leyte. For 20 years now, she has been making salbaro (a native type of biscuit), using her improvised oven which is made of big cans. This business allows her to provide for her four children ages 3, 7, 8, and 10. She is asking for a loan to sustain her business and buy flour, sugar, and coconut.

Amparo desires to make improvements in the way she manages her business and the loan will be helpful for her plan. In the future, she dreams of seeing her children have a good education.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and coconut

loans.name: Tholung Ronika

texts.en:
“I am always positive minded, friendly, sincere, hardworking, and love to travel around the world” said Ronika, pictured with her mother. She is 18 years old and lives with her family, including her parents and two siblings. She grew up in a cross-cultural bilingual family with both parents belonging to different tribes of Manipur. All of the siblings are fluent with both dialects. 

Since her childhood, she dreamt of becoming an air hostess so that she could travel around the globe and explore different cultures. Her mother is a homemaker while her father works in private to earn their living. The family survived through hard times with the meager income the father brings home. Whilst in the midst of financial pressure, they were overjoyed to hear the news of their daughter’s selection for cabin crew held in town. 

However, their joyful moment did not last long because of the thought of paying the large sum of the security deposit to undergo training. While they were in deep concern, one of her friends who once availed a loan from Kiva suggested the educational loan in WSDS that Ronika can avail. She told her parents about the information her friend shared. The family was delighted with the information and contacted WSDS as soon as they heard the news. 

Ronika is really happy and thankful to all the people who help in achieving her goal, and also to WSDS and Kiva for their financial help. She said “I wouldn’t be able to go for my training without this loan.” Now that she availed the loan, she will be able to fulfill her dreams to fly high and wishes that such an altruistic act would flourish to help the world to be a better place. 

She will repay the loan amount once she earns without any delay. She also wishes to provide for her family in financial matters, especially her siblings’ education.

loans.use: To pay the security deposit for cabin crew training.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in galvanized sheet metal and wood to put a roof on his house.

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru: Мунира родилась в 1962 году. Она добросовестная и жизнерадостная женщина. Мунира заботливая мать 2 детей. Она занимается собственным бизнесом уже более 6 лет. Мунира покупает оптом платки из столичного рынка и продает в розницу на местном рынке своего района. Мунира очень ответственно относится к бизнесу и постепенно год за годом развевает свой бизнес. Мунира с бизнесом справляется сама. Она планирует увеличить оборотный капитал и поэтому она запрашивает займ на сумму 6000 сомони для покупки платков. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Munira was born in 1962.  She is a conscientious and cheerful woman and the caring mother of 2 children.  She has been running her own business purchasing scarves wholesale and then reselling them at the local market in her neighborhood for more than 6 years.  Munira is very responsible in regards to her business and gradually, year by year, has grown her business.  Munira runs her business by herself.  She plans to increase her working capital and for this reason is asking for a loan of 6000 TJS to purchase dresses.  She awaits your kindness and is counting on your charity.

loans.use: To buy scarves to increase her working capital

loans.name: Kadyrkul

texts.ru: Кадыркул, 59 лет, женат, есть взрослый сын. Образование-среднее. На протяжении 30 лет занимается сельским хозяйством- животноводством и полеводством. Ежемесячный доход на сегодняшний день составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Кадыркула, на сегодняшний день он имеет хорошее хозяйство: 2 коровы, 10 овец, 1 лошадь и 10,00 ГА собственной земли, где Кадыркул выращивает клевер и ячмень для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кадыркул обратился в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одной коровы. Доходы от кредита он планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества скота, а также сделать ремонт дома.
texts.en: Kadyrkul is 59 years old, married, and has a grown son. He has an intermediate education. For the past 30 years he has farmed and raised livestock. His current monthly income is around 20,000 som (KGS). Thanks to his tireless work Kadyrkul now has a good farm with 2 cows, 10 sheep, a horse, and 10 hectares of land where he grows clover and barley for his own use and sale. In order to further develop his business, Kadyrkul came to the Bai-Tushum bank for a 70,000 som (KGS) loan to buy a cow. He plans to use the income from use of his loan to invest in further expanding his herd, and also to do home repairs.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is 48 years old and married. She and her spouse have been blessed with four children. She has a grocery business that she has been running for twenty years.

She plans to use this loan to buy more stocks of vegetables, tomatoes and fruits. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business.

This is her fifth loan term from VisionFund Kenya. She has repaid her previous loans. Her future hopes are to grow her business, make more income, and to educate her children to a higher level.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of vegetables and tomatoes.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es:
María es una pequeña comerciante, vive junto a su esposo, María solamente estudio quinto grado de educación básica y poco a poco se fue volviendo comerciante, principalmente vendiendo carne de res, también decidió instalar su propio negocio en su casa de habitación y está elaborando tortillas las que vende a sus vecinos, también en la venta de tortillas se involucra su nuera quien recibe un pequeño pago de la venta de las tortillas. 

María vende tortillas de lunes a sábado descansando únicamente los días domingos, compra los insumos en la ciudad a raíz de que accede a precios más cómodos, y con ello poder tener mayores ganancias en sus ventas. 

El crédito que en esta solicitando, es para comprar pan dulce para comercializarlo en una motocicleta, y reparar la motocicleta la que en estos momentos presenta desperfectos mecánicos y necesita ser reparada en la brevedad posible y siendo el medio de transporte que utiliza para su trabajo recuren a la ayuda de la institución para, los planes de María en el futuro son instalar una pequeña granja de aves de corral en su casa de habitación
texts.en: María is a small-scale entrepreneur who lives with her husband. María only studied through the fifth grade. Little-by-little, she became an entrepreneur, primarily selling beef. She also decided to open her own business in her house. She makes tortillas to sell to her neighbors. The tortilla business also involves her daughter-in-law who receives a small salary from the sale of the tortillas. María sells tortillas from Monday to Saturday, only relaxing on Sundays. She buys the ingredients in the city since the prices are lower and allow her to earn more money from sales. She is applying for a loan to buy sweet bread to sell from a motorcycle and to repair the motorcycle, which has some mechanical problems. It needs to be repaired as soon as possible since it is the means of transportation that she uses in her work, which requires that institution's help.  María's future plan is to install a small chicken coop at her house.

loans.use: to buy sweet bread to sell from a motorcycle and to repair the motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood and nails to replace the roof of his home.

loans.name: Anvarjon

texts.ru:
Анварчон студент  Технологического  Университета Таджикистана. Он  родился  1994 года. Он живет с мамой, отцом и братом. Его родители простые рабочие.
Оценки у Анварчона хорошие. В будущем хочет  быть высококвалифицированным экономистом.   В настоящее время Анварчон очень способный молодой человек. Он очень доброжелательный, довольно  спокойный и разумный.  
 Анварчон запрашивает займ в размере 625 долларов США для оплаты обучения за тертый   курс.   Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Anvarjon is a student at the Technological University of Tajikistan.  He was born in 1994 and lives with his mother, father, and brother.  His parents are simple laborers.  Anvarjon has good grades and wants to become a qualified economist.  Anvarion is a very capable young man - he is very conscientious, calm, and intelligent.  Anvarion is asking for a loan of 625 US dollars to pay tuition.  He awaits your kindness and is counting on your charity.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Jewa

texts.en:
Jewa is a married woman with five children. For the past two years, she has operated a business selling cereals from her home to her neighbors and passersby. Jewa lives in a rental house without electricity or running water and her greatest monthly expense is food for the family. Her major business challenge is seasonality. Jewa decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

Jewa is requesting a 28,800 KES loan to purchase stock of wheat, maize, beans, and rice to sell. In the future, she dreams of establishing a wholesale cereals shop.

loans.use: to purchase wheat, maize, beans and rice to sell

loans.name: Deysi Margarita

texts.es:
Deysi de 55 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, no logro superarse academicamente debido a que su familia no tenia los recursos necesarios. Se encuantra casada, es madre de 3 hijos, se dedica a la agricultura y la ganaderia junto a su esposo.

 Deysi aprendio este trabajo a la edad de 20 años, el credito sera tilizado en la compra de 4 novillos de repasto, los cuales cuidara y engordara para venderlos y obtener ganancias.

El sueño de Deysi es tener salud y vida para seguir trabajando, sacar adelante a su familia y asi tener una casa digna para su familia y segurar el futuro de sus hijos.
texts.en: 55-year-old Deysi studied through the third grade. She didn't continue moving ahead in school since her family did not have the necessary resources. She is a married mother with 3 children. She works in agriculture and ranching with her husband. Deysi learned this trade at the age of 20. The loan will be used to buy 4 bulls to care for and fatten up before selling them and obtaining a profit. Deysi's dream is to be healthy and alive in order to continue working and supporting her family. Through this, she would like a dignified house for her family and a better future for her children.

loans.use: to buy four bulls to care for and fatten up before selling them and obtaining a profit.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: María tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 16 y 2 año de edad. María se gana la vida por medio de la venta de prendas de vestir y por su trabajo en una institución cercana a su localidad. María ha decidido nuevamente solicitar un crédito a FUSAI pero en esta ocasión para invertir en la mejora de su vivienda dado que desea repellar las paredes de su vivienda ya que se encuentran deterioradas. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento y arena. Espera poder contar con este apoyo al igual como lo recibió en el pasado.
texts.en: María is 34-years old and lives in her own home with her two children, who are 16- and 2- years old respectively.  María earns her living selling clothing and working in an institution near her neighborhood.  She has decided to request a new loan from FUSAI, this time to invest in making improvements to her house.  She wants to stucco the walls of her house, as they are deteriorating.  With the requested sum, she will purchase cement and sand.  María hopes to be able to count on this financial support, just as she was able to receive it in the past.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand to stucco the walls of her home.

loans.name: Bhilali

texts.fr: Prestataire de service à SOKODE, Bhilali jeune homme de 24ans multiplie les copies aux clients dans sa boutique louée à cet effet. Afin d'acheter une photocopieuse d’occasion pour servir ses clients, il demande un premier prêt à WAGES. Son désir est d'agrandir son activité et se prendre en charge.
texts.en: Bhilali is a 24-years old man who works providing photocopying services in Sokode. He rents a shop for this purpose. He is seeking his first loan from WAGES in order to buy a used photocopier to  meet his clients' needs. His goal is to expand his business and be able to support himself.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier.

loans.name: Gulshan

texts.ru: Гулшан трудолюбивая женщина. Она имеет средне-специальное образование по специальности парикмахера. Гулшан разведенная и воспитывает своих 2 несовершеннолетних детей одна. Она год назад открыла собственный свадебный салон. Гулшан предоставляет услуги парикмахера и дает в прокат свадебные платья. Она имеет 2 учениц. Гулшан постепенно набирает опыта в ведении бизнеса и развевается. Она планирует купить новые свадебные платья для своего салона и расширить, таким образом, ассортимент. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки свадебных платьев. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Gulshan is a hard-working woman.  She has a specialized secondary education as a hairstylist.  Gulshan is divorced and is raising her 2 small children alone.  One year ago she opened a wedding shop.  Gulshan provides hair dressing services and rents out wedding dresses.  She has two students and is gradually gaining experience in business.  She plans to buy new wedding dresses for her store so that she can expand her inventory and is asking for a loan of 10,000 TJS to purchase the dresses.  She awaits your kindness and is relying on your charity.

loans.use: To buy wedding dresses to expand her inventory

loans.name: Clementine

texts.en:
Clementine is 42 years old and is married with six children between 12 and 22 years old. All of her children go to school. For the last two years, Clementine has operated a bar.

Clementine is requesting a loan to buy more soda, beer, and juice to sell. She will use the profits from her loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy soda, beer, and juice to sell

loans.name: Gulnura

texts.ru: Гулнура, 33 года, замужем, мать 3 детей. У Гулнуры среднее образование,работает в школе, также в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, вместе с супругом занимаются животноводством, стартовав много лет назад с суммы 10,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду, Гулнура на сегодняшний день имеет 2 коровы, 30 овец и 3 лошади. Ее прибыль от бизнеса составляет 7,000 сом в месяц (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулнура обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса
texts.en: Gulnura is 33 years old, married, and has three children. She has an intermediate education and works at a school. She earns additional income for her family by raising livestock with her husband. They started years ago with an initial investment of 10,000 som. Thanks to tireless work, Gulnura currently has two cows, 30 sheep, and three horses. Her profit from the business is 7,000 som (KGS) a month. With the goal of further developing the business, Gulnura came to the Bai-Tushum bank for a 25,000 som (KGS) loan to buy sheep. She plans to invest income from the loan into further developing her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sheep

loans.name: Blanca Asteria

texts.es:
Blanca de 53 años de edad, quien realiza la actividad de oficios doméstico y preparación de antojitos tales como Yuca frita, papitas, enredos, tostadas, etc.  y vive junto a su esposo quien se dedica a la actividad de producción agrícola al igual que su hijo de 13 años de edad que se encuentra estudiando.

Blanca se decidió a realizar un crédito para el mejoramiento de su producción de antojitos; comprara unas cacerolas, unas cucharas,ademas invertirá parte de su capital en productos alimenticios: plátanos para las tostadas, aceite, yuca, sal entre otros productos, ya que dicha actividad la realiza desde hace 17 años y con el tiempo que tiene de realizar dicha actividad tiene una cantidad de clientes considerables y en algunas ocasiones trabaja por medio de pedidos, por lo que necesita mejorar su producción.

Desea mejorar su vivienda y su negocio ya que es el medio de subsistencia de su familia y que su hijo concluya un nivel académico que le permita desarrollar labores a futuro.
texts.en:
Blanca is 53 years old and she does domestic work and prepares snacks like fried yucca, french fries, enredos (a traditional food make with yucca), plantain chips, etc. She lives with her husband who works in agriculture and her 13 year old son who is studying.

Blanca decided to take a loan to improve her production of snack foods. She will buy some pans, spoons, and also invest some of the money in food products: plantains to make plantain chips, oil, yucca, salt amongst other products. She has been doing this business for 17 years and with time has made a considerable number of clients. Sometimes she works filling orders so she needs to improve her production.

She wants to improve her house and her business as it is the means of sustenance for the family. She also wants her son to study to an academic level that will allow him to get work in the future.

loans.use: to buy pans, spoons, plantains, oil, yucca, salt, etc.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan se encuentra acompañado, padre de 3 hijos. Juan no continuo con sus estudios ya que su familia no tenia los recursos necesarios para sacarlo adelante, Juan aprendio a trabajar la agricultura a la edad de 18 años trabajo que aprendio de sus padres.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar 2 novillos pequeños, los cuales engordara y cuidara para posteriosmente venderlos y asi poder obtener ganacias, el sueño de Juan es poner su propio negocio para salir adelante, mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida
texts.en: Juan is in a relationship and the father of 3 children. Juan did not continue with her studies since his family did not have the necessary resources for him to get ahead. Juan learned to work in agriculture at the age of 18 years. He learned from his parents. The loan that he is applying for is to buy 2 small bulls, which he will fatten and raise in order to eventually sell them and obtain a profit. Juan's dream is to open his own business in order to get ahead and better his income and his quality-of-life.

loans.use: to buy 2 small bulls, which he will fatten and raise in order to eventually sell them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to go out and sell bread in places where he could not reach before.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy aluminum sheets, wood, poles, iron, etc. to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Soleha

texts.ru: Солеха вдова. Она работает оператором в сотовой компании. В данной компании она работает последние 3 года. Солеха одна вырастила 2 детей, так как ее муж умер рано. Солеха очень трудолюбивая женщина. Она всегда старается, чтобы ее дети получили хорошее образование. Ее младший сын учится в Полицейской школе.  Солеха обратилась за займом в сумме 1000 сомони для оплаты учебы сына. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Soleha is a widow.  She works as an operator in a cell phone company, and has worked at the same company for the past 3 years.  Her husband died early, and so Soleha raised 2 children by herself.  Soleha is a very hardworking woman.  She has always strived to give her children good educations.  Her younger son is studying at the Polytechnic school.  Soleha is asking for a loan of 1000 TJS to pay her son's tuition.  She awaits your kindness and is relying on your charity.

loans.use: To pay for her son's education

loans.name: Ehromjon

texts.ru: Эхромчон родился в 1989 году на северной части Таджикистана. Он родился и вырос в семье фермера. Его отец очень старался, чтобы его сын получил хорошие знания и поступил в университет. Еще в детстве он прочитал много классических литератур благодаря своему отцу. Эхромчон благодарен, своим родителям за то, что они создали ему условия для получения высшего образования. Данное время Эхромчон является студентом 4 курса Медицинского Университета Таджикистана. Он учится успешно. Эхромчон обратился за займом для того, чтобы оплатить за учебный договор. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Ehromjon was born in 1989 in the northern part of Tajikistan.  He was born and raised in a family of farmers.  His father strived hard to help his son gain knowledge and attend university.  Even in childhood he read a lot of classic literature thanks to his father.  Ehromjon is grateful to his parents that they gave him the resources that he needed to receive a higher education.  Ehromjon is now a student in his fourth year at the Medical University of Tajikistan, and he is succeeding academically.  Ehromjon requested a loan so that he can pay his tuition.  He awaits your kindness and is relying on your charity.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Rosa De Saron Group

texts.es:
Al grupo solidario Rosa de Saron lo integran cuatros socias exitosas, es coordinado por la señora Ivania, quien tiene la edad de 39 años, casada y madre de dos hijos de las edades de 21 y 20 años, a quienes le ha brindado buenas condiciones de vida y sobre todo que no les ha hecho falta el alimento, se dedica a la comercialización de ropa y también ofrece el servicio de comida en su comunidad y zona franca cercana a su propiedad. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de flete de leña, arroz, frijol, pollo, carne de res, carne de cerdo, plátano verde, plátano maduro, bolsas, papel, etc., con el crédito anterior logro la compra de utensilios para mejorar la calidad de sus productos. 
El resto de los integrantes son las señoras Lissette de 31 años de edad, quien comercializa calzados y accesorios de plata y cobre, Dora quien tiene la edad de 60 años y es propietaria de una pulpería donde también ofrece calzado y los fines de semanas ofrece el servicio de comida (fritanga), y María de la Luz, de 66 años, quien ofrece en su domicilio el servicio de comida (fritanga) desde hace ocho años.
texts.en:
The support group Rosa de Saron is made up of successful members. It is coordinated by Ivania, who is 39 years old. She is married and the mother of two children, aged 21 and 20. She have given them good living conditions and above all they have not gone hungry. She sells clothes and she also has a food service in her community and in the free trade zone close to her community. The loan she is asking for is to buy a load of firewood, rice, beans, chicken, beef, pork, green plantains, ripe plantains, bags, paper, etc With the previous loan she was able to buy utensils to improve the quality of her products. 
 
The rest of the members are Lissette, aged 31, who sells shoes and silver and copper accessories, Dora, who is 60 years old and is the owner of a little store where she also offers shoes and on weekends sells food (fritanga), and María de la Luz, aged 66, who has sold food from her home (fritanga) for 8 years.

loans.use: to buy a load de firewood, rice, beans, chicken, beef, pork, green plantains, ripe plantains, bags,paper, etc.

loans.name: Toktobu

texts.ru: Токтобу 39 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей дошкольного возраста. Образование высшее, уже много лет работает в школе. Токтобу на протяжении 5 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав бизнес с суммы в 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Токтобу в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, 1 лошадь и земельный участок мерою 2,24 ГА, на котором она выращивает ячмень для корма скоту. Токтобу обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 45,000 сом (KGS) на покупку одной нетели.  На полученные доходы от кредита Токтобу планирует и дальше увеличивать поголовье скота, чтобы иметь возможность построить еще один сарай для скота.
texts.en: Toktobu is 39 years old, married, and the mother of three children who are not in school yet. She has a higher education and has been working in a school for many years already. For five years Toktobu has been raising livestock and farming. The business began with 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to tireless work Toktobu's property currently includes two cows, a horse, and 2.24 hectares of land where she grows barley to feed her animals. Toktobu came to the Bai-Tushum bank for a 45,000 som (KGS) loan to buy a heifer. She plans to use the income earned from the loan to further expand her livestock herd, and to create the opportunity to build an additional barn for her animals.

loans.use: to purchase a heifer to increase her number of livestock

loans.name: Ia

texts.en:
Ia, who is a 30-year-old married woman, lives in Rustavi city with her husband and three daughters. The only source of income for the family is her husband's salary. He works as a private artisan. Ia is a housekeeper and has a great desire to be involved in her own business and do her bit for the family's welfare. 

In the region there is a high unemployment rate, but self-employment helps inhabitants to make living. So, Ia decided to start a trading business with a loan, but the local credit providers usually demand experience and some stable income from the borrowers. With the loan of 900 USD, she will purchase babies’ clothing and various kinds of home products at wholesale prices, and sell them in her community. 

This will give her a chance to earn income and become financially independent. Regarding the Startup program, Ia will be able to make savings and provide a better future for her children.

loans.use: to start a retail business and generate her own income.

loans.name: La Amistad-73 Group

texts.es:
Claudia es una mujer de 23 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos y su negocio es el maquillaje y manicure.
Ella es emprendedora, responsable, constante, trabajadora y muy comunicativa. Su labora la realiza de forma ambulante en diferentes barrios de su ciudad, según donde vivan o estén sus clientes.
Claudia es de tez morena, estatura mediana, cabello negro largo, su idioma materno es el español y conoce el guaraní por herencia familiar (sentada la primera de la derecha,  sosteniendo una cartera marrón). Debido a la necesidad de superación, conformó una banca de personas para solicitar un préstamo y poder trabajar de mejor manera en sus actividades. Su trabajo consiste en realizar maquillaje y manicure para todo tipo de acontecimientos, como; Maquillaje día, noche, alta noche, rejuvenecedor, de envejecimiento, de camuflaje, de fantasía, etc., en cuanto a las uñas ella comienza quitando el esmalte con un quita esmalte oleoso regenerador sin acetona, luego las limpia y les da forma utilizando limas de cristal de bohemia, continúa arreglando las cutículas y les pasa una crema, para darle una pasada de esmalte endurecedor y termina pintándolas con diseños o simplemente lisas. Su deseo de superación hace que incursione en el mundo del peinado, pasando clases y dando sus primeros pasos. Su sueño es tener su propio salón de belleza y dictar clases como maquillaje, manicure y peinados. Ella desea hacer una inversión en su negocio realizando la compra de materiales de belleza para poder atender a más clientes.
Es por esos motivos que Claudia solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales de manicure y maquillaje para desarrollar su negocio.
texts.en:
Claudia is a 23-year-old woman, single, and does not have children. Her business is in makeup and manicures. She is entrepreneurial, responsible, consistent, hardworking, and very communicative. She carries out her work in house in different neighborhoods within her city both either where she lives or where her clients live. 

Claudia is of morena [dark] complexion and medium height. She has long dark hair and while her native language is Spanish she knows Guaraní as a result of her family's heritage. She is the first sitting on the right carrying a brown purse. 

Due to the need to get ahead, she became part of a group of people to request a loan and be able to work better in her business. Her work consists of doing manicures and makeup for all types of events. She does makeup for daytime, nighttime, evening wear, as well as for rejuvenation purposes, to look older, cover up and costume makeup, etc. In terms of manicures she first removes the nail polish with a regenerating, oil-based remover that does not contain acetone. Afterwards, she cleans the nails, and uses Bohemian crystal nail files followed by fixing up the cuticles and applying creams. She then applies a strengthening polish to the nails and finishes by painting them with designs or solid colors.      

Her hope is to get ahead and enter into the world of hair styling by taking classes and giving it a try. Her dream is to have her own beauty salon and give classes on makeup, manicures, and hair styling. She wants to invest in her business by purchasing beauty products so that she can serve more clients. This is why Claudia is requesting a loan to purchase makeup and manicure products to develop her business.

loans.use: to buy makeup and manicure products to develop her business.

loans.name: Roza

texts.ru: Роза, 34 года, замужем, 2 детей. У Розы высшее образование, с 2009 года в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается торговлей женской одеждой. У нее есть свой контейнер, товарооборот составляет 700,000 сом (KGS). Одежду Роза заказывает с доставкой у оптовых продавцов на крупном рынке страны, после перепродает ее на местном рынке. Роза известна, как принципиальный, честный, порядочный и надежный человек. Ее ежемесячная прибыль доходит до 50,000 сом (KGS).
